title: Edit As You Wish: Video Caption Editing with Multi-grained User Control
abstract: arXiv:2305.08389v3 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: Automatically narrating videos in natural language complying with user requests, i.e. Controllable Video Captioning task, can help people manage massive videos with desired intentions. However, existing works suffer from two shortcomings: 1) the control signal is single-grained which can not satisfy diverse user intentions; 2) the video description is generated in a single round which can not be further edited to meet dynamic needs. In this paper, we propose a novel \textbf{V}ideo \textbf{C}aption \textbf{E}diting \textbf{(VCE)} task to automatically revise an existing video description guided by multi-grained user requests. Inspired by human writing-revision habits, we design the user command as a pivotal triplet \{\textit{operation, position, attribute}\} to cover diverse user needs from coarse-grained to fine-grained. To facilitate the VCE task, we \textit{automatically} construct an open-domain benchmark dataset named VATEX-EDIT

tldr: 该文章提出了一个名为VATEX-EDIT的开放领域基准数据集，用于自动修订现有视频描述，以适应用户的多层次请求。用户请求被设计为由“操作、位置和属性”组成的精炼三元组，实现了从粗粒度到细粒度的用户需求覆盖。通过这种方式，该任务允许用户对视频描述进行动态编辑和修订，从而满足不同的用户意图。
